title: 2018년 Dr. Norman C. Loggins v. Continental Apartments 사건
summary: 미국 Tennessee, TN 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Dr. Norman C. Loggins v. Continental Apartments. 판결일: 2018-02-27. 법원: Court of Appeals of Tennessee.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Dr. Norman C. Loggins v. Continental Apartments
**판결일**: 2018-02-27
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Tennessee
**관할**: Tennessee, TN

**판사**: Judge Kenny Armstrong


## 판결문 요약

                                                                                         02/27/2018
               IN THE COURT OF APPEALS OF TENNESSEE
                            AT JACKSON
                         Assigned on Briefs February 2, 2018

 DR. NORMAN C. LOGGINS v. CONTINENTAL APARTMENTS ET AL.

                  Appeal from the Circuit Court for Shelby County
                      No. CT-004362-16 Jerry Stokes, Judge
                     ___________________________________

                           No. W2017-00955-COA-R3-CV
                       ___________________________________


This complaint is a forcible entry and detainer action. Appellant appeals the trial court’s
denial of his motion for default judgment. The order appealed is not a final judgment so
as to confer subject matter jurisdiction on this Court pursuant to Rule 3 of the Tennessee
Rules of Appellate Procedure. Accordingly, we dismiss the appeal. Because the trial
court entered its order dismissing Appellant’s complaint while the appeal was pending in
this Court, we vacate the order of dismissal.


  Tenn. R. App. P. 3 Appeal as of Right; Judgment of the Circuit Court Vacated;
                                Appeal Dismissed

KENNY ARMSTRONG, J., delivered the opinion of the court, in which D. MICHAEL
SWINEY, C.J., and W. NEAL MCBRAYER, J., joined.

Dr. Norman C. Loggins, Memphis, Tennessee, Pro Se.

Cedrick D. Wooten, Memphis, Tennessee, for the appellees, Continental Apartments,
